blogs.paragraph: Benjamin Mendy makes his return to football by signing as new Ligue1 side Lorient player, done deal ðŸš¨ðŸŸ  Mendy signs until June 2025 as new Lorient left back after he was found not guilty by Chester Crown Court.

blogs.author: ApeChartz
blogs.paragraph:
Update on all positions

Took profit on this long and then got stopped for a near breakeven trade

Re-longed Monday low sweep with some size after seeing confirmation of trapped shorts

Closed out here at resistance for a nice move/gain

Decent execution today, happy with it 

All setups and position updates posted real time in discord, a bit harder to give updates on here
